title: Font used in "Lost Planet" title
content:
Hey,  
I would like to know wich font is used on the title of this game.  
Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1152289052\_Lost\_Planet\_Logo\_Black.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100510060436/http:/typophile.com/files/1152289052_Lost_Planet_Logo_Black.jpg) | 52.85 KB |
author: Rave

comments.content: I agree with you but the A is not the same :s

Well whatever font they used, that's probably just an upside-down 'V'.

- Lex

Not a bad idee ^^  
Thanks to both of you ;)
